page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT_ EGMANTON
page.content: Primary: Coal Mining: 1 geologist, 5 miners, 1 engineer. Oil: 1 engineer, 1 safety officer. Farming: 4 mixed, 2 pigs, 1 gamekeeper, 1 labourer, 1 contractor. Secondary: 1 horticulture, 1 heavy industry, 1 brickworks. Tertiary: 12 trading, 1 architect, 1 landscape gardener, 1 construction contractor, 1 post mistress, 4 teachers, 1 museum curator, 1 post delivery, 4 nursing, 1 hairdresser, 1 pharmacist, 1 electrical contractor, 4 office workers, 1 show jumper, 2 caterers, 1 mechanic, 1 pony breeder, 1 publican, 1 printer. 35 O.A.P'S, 1 UNEMPLOYED, 51 CHILDREN.
